SessionButtonTooltipText: Start a new session with Grok, resume a session, or view certain archives.
SessionButtonPopupIndex0Tooltip:
Start a new session, storing
the previous one.
SessionButtonPopupIndex2Tooltip:
Display the full response
chain of the current session
SessionButtonPopupIndex3Tooltip:
Display the history of user queries
sent in the current session
SessionButtonPopupIndex4Tooltip:
Display the full prompt
sent in the last request
PreferencesButtonTooltipText: Set your preferences for the interface.
PreferencesButtonPopupIndex0Tooltip: Select a persona for Grok to use
PreferencesButtonPopupIndex1Tooltip: Toggle between Dark and Light themes
PreferencesButtonPopupIndex2Tooltip:
Enable or disable password protection
upon application launch
PreferencesButtonPopupIndex3Tooltip:
Enable or disable spell checking
for user input
PreferencesButtonPopupIndex4Tooltip: Select the font for the interface
PreferencesButtonPopupIndex5Tooltip:
Adjust the font size for the user
input and output displays
PreferencesButtonPopupIndex6Tooltip:
Enable or disable voice input
and output
ModelButtonTooltipText:
Shows the Grok models available
to you and allows you to select one
for your next response.
ToolsButtonTooltipText:
Tools that Grok can
use on your query.
ToolsButtonPopupIndex1Tooltip: Enable or disable Collection Search Tool
ToolsButtonPopupIndex2Tooltip: Enable or disable Web Search Tool
ToolsButtonPopupIndex3Tooltip: Enable or disable Code Execution Tool
InformationButtonTooltipText:
Open your xAI console, update your
xAI API Key or edit your user information
or custom instructions.
InformationButtonPopupIndex0Tooltip: Open a browser window to your xAI console
InformationButtonPopupIndex1Tooltip: Enter a new Grok API Key
HelpButtonTooltipText: Some topics to help you use AMI.
HelpButtonPopupIndex1Tooltip: Learn more about tokens and usage
HelpButtonPopupIndex2Tooltip:
Open a browser window to view
xAI's Grok API documentation
HelpButtonPopupIndex3Tooltip: View AMI application information and credits
LocalizationButtonTooltipText:
The language and locality you've
selected. Click to change.
OutLabelTooltipText:
Files Grok has created for you. Click
a filename to view or export it to your computer.
ArtifactsListTooltipText:
Files Grok has created for you. Click
a filename to view or export it to your computer.
InLabel2TooltipText:
Files you've uploaded to Grok.
Click a filename to view it.
UploadsListTooltipText:
Files you've uploaded to Grok.
Click a filename to view it.
UploadButtonTooltipText:
Upload a file for Grok to
use during this session.
SLabelTooltipText:
The total cost of all responses
 since this session began.
SessionLabelTooltipText:
The total cost of all responses
since this session began.
RLabelTooltipText:
The total cost of all responses
since your budget was updated.
RunningLabelTooltipText:
The total cost of all responses
since your budget was updated.
SendButtonTooltipText:
Send the contents of the Input
Panel to the Grok model shown at the
lower right and get a response.
TokensLabelTooltipText:
Current memory usage, in tokens. Total context
window, cached tokens, prompt tokens, completion tokens
and reasoning tokens.
ModelLabelTooltipText:
Current connection status and the name
of the Grok model from which your
next response will come.
Change your model in the "Model" menu.
